message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is truly one-of-a-kind, with potential value far exceeding its cost. I'm confident that it will be a significant asset to your endeavors. I'm willing to let it go for $1500000.  This is a price point that reflects the product's potential, while still offering you a compelling deal. Please consider this offer carefully, as I believe it could be mutually beneficial.
